TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FirstDayOfWeek extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the day to display as the first day of the week on the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek> enumeration represents the values that specify which day to display as the first day of the week on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use a drop-down list to set the first day of the week for the Calendar control.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[CalendarFirstDayOfWeek#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarFirstDayOfWeek/CS/calendarfirstdayofweekcs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[CalendarFirstDayOfWeek#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarFirstDayOfWeek/VB/calendarfirstdayofweekvb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Default = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is specified by the system settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Friday = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is Friday.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Monday = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is Monday.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Saturday = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is Saturday.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Sunday = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is Sunday.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Thursday = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is Thursday.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Tuesday = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is Tuesday.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek Wednesday = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the first day of the week is Wednesday.
